member.name: T:XmlToMarkdown.Program
member.summary:
Command console program to transform all xml files in current directory utilizing supplied template file to Wiki Markdown files.
Usage: dotnet XmlToMarkdown.dll [Template file]
member.revision: __Revisions:__~~ | Contributor | Build | Revison Date | Description |~ |-------------|-------|--------------|-------------|~ | Christopher D. Cavell | 0.0.0.1 | 12/11/2021 | Initial Development |~
